mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_case WHERE id < #{id} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM t_case WHERE id > #{id} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM t_case ORDER BY sort ASC LIMIT #{cursor}, #{size}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_case SET title= #{title}, description = #{description}, customer_name= #{customerName}, service_content = #{serviceContent}, publish_time = #{publishTime}, create_time = #{createTime}, modify_time = #{modifyTime}, `type` = #{type}, image = #{image}, cover_image = #{coverImage}, color_model = #{colorModel} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_case (title,description,customer_name,service_content,publish_time, create_time,modify_time,`type`, image, color_model, cover_image) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{customerName}, #{serviceContent}, #{publishTime}, #{createTime}, #{modifyTime}, #{type}, #{image}, #{colorModel}, #{coverImage})
